document.full_text: japanese companies' demand for funding has soared since the march 11 earthquake and tsunami, with the country's top three banks seeing a surge in new loan requests, lenders said on sunday.
document.title: japan corporate funding demand soars after disaster
lines_and_colors: japanese companies' demand for funding has soared since the march 11 earthquake and tsunami, with the country's top three banks seeing a surge in new loan requests, lenders said on sunday.
